name: NATIONAL VENTURE CAPITAL ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association representing US venture capital industry
sampleDescriptions:
Policies to encourage and empower entrepreneurship, including streamlined regulations at the SEC.
Capital markets reforms to encourage more U.S. IPO's.
Volcker Rule, S. 2155 - The Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief and Consumer Protection Act, and Registered Investment Advisor rules.
CFIUS reform and limited partners.
Immigration reforms and cyber security.
Health care reform; FDA approval paths.

Provisions related to the International Entrepreneur Rule.
Investor VISA program.
Entrepreneur VISA program.

Tax reform and treatment of carried interest; Section 382, R&D, NOLs; and Section 1202.
Implementation of PL 115-97 (H.R. 1/tax reform).

Implementation of PL 115-97 (H.R. 1/tax reform).
Tax treatment of investment capital and start-up companies.
